question: A ________ is a semi-fictional representation of your ideal customer that helps you understand and relate to the audience to which you want to market your product and/or services.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Brand affinity is an individual’s brand preference given a product category.
That’s not correct. A niche market channels all marketing actions toward one well-defined segment of the market.
That’s not correct. A target market is a group of people with shared characteristics that a company has identified as potential customers for its products or services.
A buyer persona is a semi-fictional representation of your ideal customer based on market research and real data about your existing customers.

detailedSolution: A buyer persona is a semi-fictional representation of your ideal customer based on market research and real data about your existing customers.
